author: cnbc.com
title: J2 Global tops 4Q revenue forecasts
text:
LOS ANGELES (AP) _ J2 Global Inc. (JCOM) on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $49.9 million.
On a per-share basis, the Los Angeles-based company said it had profit of $1.02. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were $1.79 per share.
The internet and cloud services company posted revenue of $316.4 million in the period, topping Street forecasts. Three analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $314.5 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $139.4 million, or $2.83 per share. Revenue was reported as $1.12 billion.
J2 Global expects full-year earnings in the range of $5.95 to $6.25 per share, with revenue in the range of $1.2 billion to $1.25 billion.
J2 Global shares have declined 1 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $74.20, a decrease of 12 percent in the last 12 months.
